https://tmrev.io/movie/885272-Appan 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/r9JNFwuy86q0jutO8qXP758k5sN.jpg A cruel womaniser, who cheated death and has been bedridden for ages, harasses his wife and son out of spite. As his family waits for him to die, the villagers form a mob demanding to kill him because of his actions. When he tricks his wife into allowing him to spend time alone with another woman, his family faces a hard decision that could alter their lives forever. Appan
